mesadelvalle.title: Mesa del Valle
mesadelvalle.tagline: A collective platform uniting the leading voices in gastronomy, wine, and hospitality across Valle de Guadalupe and Ensenada.
description: Born from a shared desire to elevate the region’s identity, Mesa del Valle brings together chefs, winemakers, hoteliers, and artisans to tell a unified story of excellence, sustainability, and cultural pride.
Through strategic collaborations, international press outreach, and shared events, we aim to position Valle de Guadalupe as the gastronomic and cultural capital of Latin America.
The table is set. The future is shared.

meta.title: Mesa del Valle | A Collective from Valle de Guadalupe
meta.description: Chefs, winemakers, hoteliers and artisans shaping the region’s identity—press, collaborations and shared events.
